entities.name: ron

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione has achieved 9 "Outstandings" and one "Exceeds Expectations" in Defence Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is asking Hermione about her results.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry laughs at Hermione's reaction to Ron's teasing.
